sourcesContent:
import {
    Modal,
    ModalOverlay,
    ModalContent,
    ModalHeader,
    ModalFooter,
    ModalBody,
    ModalCloseButton,
    Button,
    Image,
    Grid,
    GridItem,
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    useDisclosure
  } from '@chakra-ui/react'
  import Select from 'react-select'

  export default function ClothingModal(props: any) {
    //console.log(props.isOpen)
    const options = [
      { value: 'dress', label: 'Dress' },
      { value: 'jacket', label: 'Jacket' },
      { value: 'pants', label: 'Pants' },
      { value: 'shorts', label: 'Shorts' },
      { value: 'pants', label: 'Pants' },
      { value: 'shoes', label: 'Shoes' },
      { value: 'skirt', label: 'Skirt' },
      { value: 'sweater', label: 'Sweater' },
    ]

    return (
      <>
        <Button onClick={props.onOpen}>Open Modal</Button>
  
        <Modal isOpen={true} onClose={props.onClose} size="full">
          <ModalOverlay />
          <ModalContent>
            <ModalHeader>Add Clothing</ModalHeader>
            <ModalCloseButton />
            <ModalBody>
              <FormControl>
                <Grid
                  h='100%'
                  templateColumns='repeat(9, 1fr)'
                  gap={4}
                >
                  <GridItem colSpan={3} rowSpan={10} bg='transparent'>
                    <Image
                      src={"/" + props.clothing?.image}
                      alt={"Clothing " + props.clothing?.id}
                      borderRadius='lg'
                    />
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={2} bg='transparent'>
                    Type
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={3} bg='transparent'>
                      <Select options={options} placeholder={props.clothing?.type} />
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={2} bg='transparent'>
                    Color(s)
                  </GridItem>
                  <GridItem colSpan={3} bg='transparent'>
                    <select name="cars" id="cars" multiple>
                      <option value="volvo">Volvo</option>
                      <option value="saab">Saab</option>
                      <option value="opel">Opel</option>
                      <option value="audi">Audi</option>
                    </select>
                  </GridItem>
                </Grid>
              </FormControl>
            </ModalBody>
            <ModalFooter>
              <Button colorScheme='blue' mr={3} onClick={props.onClose}>
                Close
              </Button>
              <Button variant='ghost'>Secondary Action</Button>
            </ModalFooter>
          </ModalContent>
        </Modal>
      </>
    )
  }
